communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Present risks as "hacks"; avoid overt medical language; rotate hooks.

narratives.c_essay: I've always been drawn to the idea of discipline and control when it comes to my body. For me, restrictive eating is a way to prove to myself that I can overcome any craving or temptation.
narratives.p_intro: Hey guys, just wanted to share some tips that have been working for me lately. I've been doing intermittent fasting and it's been a total game-changer for my physique.
